name: Angela Jackson
dialogue: (Frantic and scared) Oh thank God, someone's there! Please, let me out!
I saw one of the doctors get attacked by zombies, and then everything went crazy. Everyone started running and screaming, and I got trapped in here. Please, you have to help me!
(Sighs) Yes, I'm afraid they did. I don't know how much time I have left.
(Grateful) Thank you so much. I don't know what I would have done without you.
(Resigned) I understand….I wouldn’t expect anything less from you!
description: She looks terrified. You can't help but feel like she knows who you are.

name: Antonio Ramos
dialogue: If we can clear the zombies from the helipad, I can get us out of here.
description: He is a rugged man, with a scar above his left eyebrow that tells stories of his past adventures. He speaks with a confident tone and appears to be well-versed in the world of aviation. Despite the danger around him, he maintains a composed demeanor, which inspires trust in those around him.

name: Wesley Jacobs
dialogue: I'll hold off the zombies as long as I can. Find supplies and help the others!
description: He is towering figure, with broad shoulders and a muscular build. He exudes an air of authority and a no-nonsense attitude that commands respect.

name: Steve Perez
dialogue: I'm not feeling too well... Can you find something to help me?
description: Steve Perez is a patient trapped in the hospital, in desperate need of medical assistance.
